text:
We had an amazing time at Vil Uyana, highly recommend. 
This is our first trip to Sri Lanka and what a wonderful start.  This eco friendly hotel is simply wonderful, serene, quiet and restful. The hotel and staff were absolutely amazing especially Dissa (Dissanayake) who was assigned to look after us during our stay.  No ask( big or small) was too much for him.

We loved the closeness to nature, the outdoor shower was great fun to use and we even had our own resident peacock in the  garden patio. 

Excellent naturalist at the hotel too.  Very knowledgeable about Sri Lankan wildlife. Joined him on the night time loris trail. Sadly no sightings for us although other guests had been lucky on previous days!! 

Food was delicious, both International and Sri Lankan cuisines, and a huge thank you to the teams in the kitchen and front of house.
title: Great hotel in the midst of nature …

roomTip: Marshland villas have plunge pool and are close enough to reception and restaurant to walk.
text:
Wow! What an amazing place! We had three nights here on our tour of Sri Lanka. Our beautiful villa with plunge pool overlooked marshland and was incredibly well equipped even down to big sunhats. Staff here all go above and beyond with service and provide electric buggies to transport you round the premises. The marshland villas were close to reception and restaurant so we could easily walk which was a bonus.
Food excellent although service in restaurant is a bit haphazard, no one seems to coordinate service. A minor detail though in an otherwise fantastic resort. Our personal butler Chattu was a star and did everything he could to ensure our stay was comfortable. The complimentary bottle of wine was a bonus especially as it was valentines day. The restaurant produced a sumptuous 5 course valentines meal with table decorations etc. We weren't expecting it so it made our day! 
There is the eco park area to explore here with guided walks arranged by hotel. A unique property and a highlight of Sri Lanka. Highly recommend.
title: A unique and fabulous place to stay

placeInfo/address: Mahamudali Mawatha, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka
text:
Peaceful, quiet and tranquil boutique hotel set in a lush green landscape close to a gushing river. Lots of birds (and cicadas after rains), troops of monkeys and other small animals are around, specially in the mornings. Lots of big trees and a tree house to sit and chill in above the green canopy. The paddy field was brown and awaiting planting at the time we visited, which was the only downer. 
Service is top class, very attentive and courteous staff. Food is delicious and plentiful. It is very relaxing to sit on the spacious balcony outside the room overlooking all the greenery and have meals served. Jetwing Lighthouse is about 800m walk away and we went there to use the gym and spa. Overall, a lovely weekend getaway with well appointed, spacious rooms, very good amenities and excellent service.
title: Relaxing, tranquil and very green retreat

text:
Secluded lovely getaway just a whistle away from the bustling city of Galle, yet you feel as if you feel as if you are miles away in the wilderness. Its a perfect getaway from the busy life from the city for a couple of days.
Not many distractions other than lots of birds chirping away and a pack of large monkeys crossing the premises twice a day. The monkeys keep to themselves and seem very scared of the humans. The food is lovely and the butler allocated to you makes sure that you are looked after very well. The light house hotel is walking distance and I used it for my gym work out.
Overall had a nice escape from the stresses of everyday craziness!
title: Lovely for a short stay

placeInfo/address: 590 Marine Drive, Colombo 00300 Sri Lanka
text:
This is our 5th stay at Marino Beach Hotel, and every visit feels like coming home. 💙 We absolutely love your facilities – especially the infinity pool, jacuzzi, and steam room – total relaxation! 💦 In addition, my partner is a big fan of the well-equipped gym. 🏋️‍♂️

The rooms are always beautifully clean and well-maintained. We especially love staying in the Signature Room with a stunning sea view – waking up to the ocean is pure bliss. 🌊🛏️

The housekeeping team is always efficient, friendly, and incredibly accommodating, and we find all the staff – from front desk to room service – to be warm, helpful, and professional. Their hospitality is truly unmatched.

Breakfast is another highlight – there's so much variety and flavor, it’s the perfect way to start the day. 🍳🥐☕

In the evenings, we love unwinding at the Sunset Bar – the view is breathtaking and it’s the perfect spot to enjoy a drink as the sun sets. 🌅🍹 And for a cosy, laid-back vibe, Floatz Pub on the 9th floor is a great place to relax and enjoy the night. 🍻🎶

From the beautiful rooms, stunning views, and top-notch facilities to the consistently friendly and accommodating staff, Marino Beach Colombo never fails to impress. If you're planning a trip to Colombo, Sri Lanka, we highly recommend Marino Beach Hotel for a relaxing and unforgettable stay. You’ll definitely be part of our next Colombo adventure! 🌴✨
title: Luxury, Great view, Romantic, Quiet, Child-friendly, Great value

placeInfo/address: 64, Peddlers Street, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka
text:
I had the pleasure of visiting The Merchant in Galle Fort twice now, and each time has been a delight! 😍 The place offers a calm and peaceful atmosphere, making it a perfect spot to relax and unwind. The ambiance is so fresh and breathable, giving you the space to just sit back and enjoy your meal 🍃✨.

The staff? Absolutely wonderful! They are super friendly and attentive, which just adds to the overall positive vibe of the place 😊. Now, let’s talk about the food – top-notch in every sense! Every dish I’ve tried so far has been incredible. My favorite drink? Definitely the Blue Curacao Mojito 🍸, refreshing and just the right amount of sweet. The Passion Fruit Juice 🥤 is also a great pick, full of flavor and freshness.

For food, we sampled the Chicken Wings 🍗, Cheese Pasta 🧀🍝, and Potato Chips 🍟 – all served beautifully and bursting with taste. The flavors are rich, and each dish feels carefully crafted. And don’t even get me started on their cheesecakes! 🍰 We tried them in multiple flavors, and they were all heavenly.

I’m already looking forward to my next visit when I’m in Galle Fort again. Truly, the calm and serene atmosphere is what makes The Merchant stand out. Loved every moment there! 🌿❤️
title: A Gem in Galle Fort: The Merchant

placeInfo/address: 64, Peddlers Street, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka
text: This is a lovely hotel with great character right in the centre of Galle Fort.  We were greeted by the very friendly and helpful staff and checked in quickly.  The room was perfect for the 3 of us and very comfortable.  There is no lift in the hotel and the stairs are quite steep which didn't bother us but if you have mobility issues could be a problem.  We stayed for 2 night and ate in the restaurant for breakfast and dinner.  The food was served rather than buffet which was a pleasant change and was plentiful and very good.  We found the staff here really nice, friendly and helpful.  The location of the hotel is great for exploring being right in the centre of Galle Fort.  The walk around the walls late in the evening was fantastic with loads of young school kids on tours adding to the atmosphere.  We would highly recommend this hotel.
title: Lovely hotel with great character and location

placeInfo/address: 64, Peddlers Street, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka
roomTip: とてもスムーズにチェックインもチェックアウトもできました。朝早く出ないと電車に間に合わなかったため、朝ご飯を食べる時間がないと相談したらボックスを用意してくれました。助かりましたし、嬉しかったです。場所はゴール旧市街のど真ん中にあり、どこに行くにも便利です。
text: 朝ご飯から夜ご飯まで美味しかったです。部屋はとても綺麗でしたし、バスルームもよかったです。Ameenさんはとても親切で、いつも相談にのってくれました。ありがとうございます。
title: ゴールの滞在におすすめ

placeInfo/address: 64, Peddlers Street, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka
roomTip: Just make sure you don’t fall into the trap of staying at a chain hotel, a boutique hotel like this one is well worth it!
text:
We were due to stay at a leading 4* hotel chain in Galle but when we checked in we were disappointed so quickly had to find an alternative.

Luckily, we found rooms on Booking.com at this property and quickly booked, and wow, what a tremendous hotel.

Upon arrival and throughout the service was spectacular, nothing was too much trouble. 

The room was beautifully decorated with everything you could need for a short or long stay, they have worked hard to keep a colonial feel without compromising on modern amenities, and they do it so well!

The food both at the bar, restaurant and room service were extraordinary, some of the best cuisine I’ve had in Sri Lanka - would definitely recommend the Biriani for dinner, or the tuna steak for lunch.

Cocktails and juices were very well made, and unique in taste, again some of the best in Sri Lanka.

The breakfast was very tasty, with a full range of options to suit all, without compromising on quality.

Thank you to all the staff, and to the owners -
Keep doing what you’re doing, as you do it so well!

See you again!
title: One of the best hotels in Sri Lanka! 5*

placeInfo/address: 64, Peddlers Street, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka

placeInfo/address: 64, Peddlers Street, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka
text:
The Merchant in Galle Fort is a stunning boutique hotel that perfectly blends modern luxury with charming architecture. Located on the vibrant Peddler Street, the hotel boasts spacious and well-maintained rooms, ensuring a comfortable stay for guests.
The in-house restaurant, 1710, offers a delightful array of culinary options, making dining a pleasure. Breakfast is made to order and features both western and Sri Lankan options that are extremely tasty.
The exceptional service provided by the staff truly sets this hotel apart. From the moment we arrived, we were welcomed with genuine Sri Lankan hospitality. A big shoutout to Shakila, Samith, Ameen, and Indika for making our stay a very memorable one.
With its prime location in the heart of Galle Fort, guests can easily explore the area's rich history and vibrant culture. The Merchant is an ideal base for families and friends alike, offering a memorable stay with fantastic food and attentive service. I highly recommend this hotel for anyone visiting Galle.
title: World class service and a beautiful hotel in the heart of Galle!

placeInfo/address: 64, Peddlers Street, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka
text:
We verbleven 2 nachten in dit nette hotel. Mocht je in een iets koelere ruimte willen lunchen dan kan dit in het restaurant met airco. Omdat mijn man helaas ziek was heb ik een paar keer alleen in het restaurant gegeten en één keer op de kamer. Dankzij de goede zorgen van Rizwan is mijn verblijf toch nog een mooie ervaring geworden. 
De koekjes die het hotel zelf maakt zijn enorm lekker en aan te bevelen....
title: Mooi centraal gelegen hotel

placeInfo/address: 64, Peddlers Street, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka
roomTip: Compared to the rest of Sri Lanka, Galle is expensive - expect UK prices everywhere you go.
text:
Superb town hotel which has been beautifully and tastefully developed and is perfectly located to enjoy the Galle experience.

The rooms are immaculate and beautifully appointed - they have even thought to provide mosquito repellent in the form of a body lotion!  Beds are incredibly comfortable.

This was the last hotel on our Sri Lanka tour and the service was comfortably on a par with the best we experienced throughout our tour.  Thanks to Amaan who gave us our wake up call and helped with cases at an ungodly hour...

We ate dinner in the hotel and the food was superb.  Both Sri Lankan and Western dishes were perfectly cooked (try the locally caught white bait) and whilst the restaurant was busy, the atmosphere was relaxed and enjoyable.  Would have been nice to have had more time between starters/mains but that's a minor quibble.

Thank you Merchant Galle and thank you Sri Lanka - simply the most wonderful country and people.
title: In the heart of Fort Galle

placeInfo/address: 64, Peddlers Street, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka

text: Todo el personal fue muy amable, Naviina nos atendió genial  y dio consejos muy útiles sobre lugares que visitar. Las instalaciones muy buenas, tanto las habitaciones como el resto del hotel. La comida estaba muy buena y se notaba que los productos eran de calidad.

placeInfo/address: 64, Peddlers Street, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka
roomTip: If there aren't enough vegetarian or vegan options on the menu - just ask! The kitchen team have amazing dishes they can swap out!!!
text: Thanks so much to Shakila for taking such good care of us and going above and beyond to make our stay special. The Merchant is a breathtakingly beautiful old building lovingly restored and thoughtfully furnished - each piece is a beautiful piece of woodwork in Galle style. The room is very comfortable and beautifully appointed with a balcony overlooking treetops and street action. Slept like a baby in this decadent bed. All the food and drinks are exquisite from the complimentary welcome drinks to the sumptuous breakfast!!! The kitchen team were super nice about doing vegetarian and vegan options whenever we asked and the mushroom breakfast curry was incredible!!! Outstanding location too - right in the centre of town - an easy and gorgeous walk to absolutely anywhere in Galle Fort!! Can't recommend this place enough!!!
title: Everything was perfect

placeInfo/address: 64, Peddlers Street, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka
text:
We had a wonderful and very comfortable stay at the Merchant ! We enjoyed the location of the hotel at the heart of Galle Fort, which enabled us to go for a walk very easily and discover the world heritage site and its surroundings. We loved the Merchant’s generous and delicious breakfast, stylish room and above all, the kindness and friendliness of the staff. 
A big up 👍 to Navina and Shakila in charge of guest relations, Samith, rooms division manager and general management dedicated to taking extra care of their customers ! Thank you for making our stay a very pleasant experience 🙏
Vanessa and Grégory

text:
This is an amazing hotel right on the beach of Pasikudah. We really enjoyed Pasikudah Beach itself--- very clean, not crowded, great place for sun bathing. And the Sun Siyam made our experience exceptional. The food was amazing, the service was great. All the rooms look over the ocean- it is one of those "wow" experiences when you walk into the room and see the view. Definitely worth staying here--- quiet, comfortable and everything we expect from the Sun Siyam.

- Service outstanding, employees very nice and always responsive.
- Room was super clean and beautiful with everything you need, nice bathroom and great views of the ocean. Wonderful room service by Janidu.
- Pool area very nice right next to the beach, with comfortable hammocks and good drinks and food service.
- Food is very good. Excellent breakfasts with many choices. Dinners also good with all types of dishes.

General Manager Arshed truely made us this stay comfortable as home away home. And Executive Housekeeper Rukshan was done a great job and checked every detail when the attendant clean our room. We got lots of knowledge about Sri Lanka  from him. We invited Rukshan for the dinner with us and unfortunately he didn't join due to hotel policy. Everyone must meet both Arshed and Rukshan when you visit Sun Siyam.

We will definitely come back again to this beautiful location.
title: Amazing place - we would definitely go back

We had a rest with friends in January 2025. We deliberately chose a hotel so far away that it would be cool, and we were not mistaken! Very clean, beautiful, the staff is as friendly and responsive as possible. Any whim, though very slow 😅 The best beach on the coast, but you can't swim in the sea right next to it. For this, there is a pool and the best view. Delicious breakfasts for every taste: from European cuisine to local with curry and others. The manager Arshed is very sociable and arranged for us a gorgeous two birthdays, with cakes and fireshow! It was so cool 🎉will be remembered for a long time, I recommend

Dear Guest 

Ayubowan!

Thank you for taking the time to share your detailed feedback about your recent stay at Sun Siyam Pasikudah. We are delighted to know that your holiday with us was unforgettable and filled with many wonderful experiences.  

We take great pride in offering a tranquil and private atmosphere surrounded by nature, and it’s heartening to hear that you enjoyed the serene environment, breathtaking sunsets, and the aesthetics throughout our property.  

I’m pleased to know that you found the rooms comfortable and appreciated the attention to cleanliness. Your kind mention of our team members, Karthik from the restaurant and Farhan from the front office, truly means a lot. They are indeed valuable members of our team, and your recognition will surely motivate them to continue delivering exceptional service.  

It’s wonderful that you enjoyed our variety of delicious dishes, particularly our breakfasts and seafood dinners. We understand that some of our dishes can be quite spicy, and we are always happy to adjust flavors to suit individual preferences – please don’t hesitate to let us know during your next visit.  

I sincerely regret the inconvenience caused by the delay in your airport transfer. Please accept my apologies for the lapse in communication with the guide, and I assure you we will review our processes to prevent such occurrences in the future.  

Thank you for recommending Sun Siyam Pasikudah to others seeking a peaceful retreat. Your advice regarding the travel time from the airport is helpful for future guests. We look forward to welcoming you back for another relaxing holiday, and we’ll ensure every aspect of your stay is seamless from start to finish.

Sun Siyam Pasikudah
placeInfo/address: Passikudah Kalkudah, Kalkudah 30410 Sri Lanka
text:
Недавно я провела незабываемый отдых в отеле "Sun Siyam Pasikudah", и хотел бы поделиться своими впечатлениями.

Отель располагается на большой зеленой территории, что создает атмосферу спокойствия и уединения. Здесь приятно гулять, наслаждаясь природой и свежим воздухом. Нереальные закаты, очень красивая природа. Эстетика в каждом уголке отеля. 

Номера в отеле очень уютные и чистые. Каждый день проводилась уборка, меняли полотенца и постельное белье, что создавало ощущение комфорта и заботы.

Особенно хочется отметить сотрудников ресторана Karthik (ass F&BManager)
и сотрудника ресепшена Farhan (front office executive) которые были невероятно дружелюбны и внимательны. Они всегда готовы помочь и сделать ваш отдых максимально приятным.

Питание в отеле разнообразное и вкусное. Каждый день предлагали новые блюда, и мы всегда находили что-то по своему вкусу. 
Еда бывает очень острая. 
Завтраки особенно понравились — свежие фрукты, выпечка и различные горячие блюда.
Вкусные морепродукты на ужин.

Единственный минус, с которым мы столкнулись, — это задержка нашего трансфера в аэропорт. Гид не выходил на связь, и это немного омрачило финал нашего отдыха. Проблему решили и мы успели доехать.  

В целом, я рекомендую "Sun Siyam Pasikudah" для тех, кто ищет спокойный и расслабляющий отдых. Учтите, что дорога от аэропорта занимает время, но это того стоит!
title: Самый эстетичный отель в Пасикуда🏝️

text:
Здравствуйте! С самого момента прибытия нас встретили дружелюбные сотрудники, которые сделали все возможное, чтобы наше пребывание было комфортным. Ресепшен работал быстро и эффективно, но однозначно нужно знать английский или иметь с собой всегда переводчик, здесь никто не говорит по русски.

Номер, в котором мы остановились, был просторным и чистым, с великолепным видом на океан. Уборка проводилась ежедневно, и всегда оставляли приятные мелочи, такие как свежие цветы на кровати в виде надписей. 

Питание в отеле просто потрясающее! Мы пробовали разнообразные блюда местной кухни, готовьтесь к тому что будет остро. 

Люди здесь очень доброжелательны.

 Мы посетили несколько местных достопримечательностей и остались в полном восторге от красоты природы и культуры Шри-Ланки.

В целом, наш отдых в Шри-Ланке превзошел все ожидания. Это идеальное место для тех, кто хочет насладиться красотой природы. Закаты здесь чудесные. Обязательно вернусь сюда снова!

Рекомендую всем, кто ищет идеальное место для отдыха на Шри-Ланке!

roomTip: Remember that this isn't an easy place for a swim due to shallowness and a lot of corals.
text:
This is a perfect balance between a boutique hotel and a large five star property. 

There are no hotel type blocks with many rooms in a row (we had first booked Uga Bay, the top rated hotel in the area, but changed as Uga Bay has four rooms in a block, while Sun Siyam is just one on a floor, in a two floor villa).

The pool is well maintained and a coral ridge creates a large shallow area of the sea where water doesn't go above waist high (you can check this in Google satellite view).

Two minor cribs:
1. Breakfast was too repetitive, though once I pointed it out, they fixed it for the third day we were there
2. They are too nice to some guests who are not playing by the rules - a couple in the pool was smoking by the edge of the pool, and staff were unwilling to request them to stop.
title: Best of a boutique hotel and a five star with all the amenities

The rooms (villas) are big specious and clean with many toiletries and bath towels and coffee and tea etc. there is plenty of walking space within the hotel to enjoy a nature trail type walk with surrounding trees. Also the buffet breakfast and dinner is reasonable with reasonable selection of food on offer. Finally the staff are really helpful and friendly and always there to help. Had a great stay and made my holiday to SL enjoyable with typical Sri Lankan hospitality.

text: This is our second stay at the property. Clearly one of the best resorts in Sri Lanka the only one of a kind high end resort attached to an international brand like Hilton. placeInfo/address: Palatupana, Yala National Park 95000 Sri Lanka
roomTip: Bring bug spray and cash for tips, there’s no stores or ATMs nearby.
text:
My husband and I visited The Hilton for a much needed nature escape for a week. We can’t properly express our immense gratitude for the Yala Resort team and the incredible treatment that made our trip spectacular. 

I’m a very detailed planner, and had no idea how absolutely inclusive and five star this property was until we arrived. The check in process was so breezy with a gorgeous upgraded villa, and the staff gave us such a warm welcome overseen by an obvious pro, Vino, the front desk manager. Asela always had a buggy ready to take us to our room and always ensured we were having whatever we needed for our stay - his smile was infectious!

Our villa had a private pool in the jungle with the ocean in the background and had every thoughtful amenity you could imagine. The property is only a year old so it is perfectly clean and divine. Beautiful lighting, makeup mirrors, a deep soaking tub, a pillow menu for whatever your needs require, umbrellas, and technology for anything you need. Cushy towels, nice robes, slippers, flip flops, bath salts, and the most expensive and technologically advanced toilet I’ve ever seen. Our housekeeping staff, Tharidu and Kasun were genuinely wanting to ensure we had everything we needed everyday and kept our room spotless and comfy all day long. The property is also plastic free which we absolutely loved and respected. Even the room keys are wood and they are leading the way with sustainability efforts. The resort pool is gorgeous and plenty of room for privacy, especially since there’s only 42 rooms here. Very exclusive vibe and personalized service. 

We pre booked 6 days worth of safaris and were lucky enough to be with our expert guide, Pazindu, and safari driving expert, Thushara every day. Getting to know these guys and know we were in good hands made us feel safe and excited to learn about Sri Lankan culture nature every day. It was really important to us to respect nature and the environment instead of the normal side of the road guys racing through the park to get a good look at whatever was there. These guys took us to remote areas, found us beautiful birds, rare sightings, elephants, leopards, and jackals and ensured we even picked up local spot experts who knew even more- to share facts, conservation work, and migration patterns of the birds that they were thrilled to see alongside us. Instead of a driver just taking you for a ride - you have a driver and a personal guide sitting with you to spot animals and take pictures for you so you can just enjoy the experience and live in the moment. They had rain jackets, coconut water, more snacks than you could ever need, and bincoulars - you literally don’t need to bring anything. We did a beach walk, dune walk, Block 1, 5, 6, Bundala Park, and Sithulpawwa. All so beautiful and different ways to see and experience culture and nature. 

The icing on the cake was Chef Jerome and his staff in the kitchen. Some of the absolute best food we’ve had in years. Beautiful presentations, local ingredients, and flavors that remind you how food should taste. He encouraged us to order off menu and took our requests and preferences into consideration when making us personalized meals. We’re so lucky to have eaten his food for a week and we’ll be chasing those flavors forever. Chanaka, Dilanka, and Indika made our meals special with fantastic service and genuine interest in making sure we had a great experience. One of the days we booked the full day safari with bush banquet - although expensive it is absolutely worth every penny - Hiran and the entire team cooked us the best meal in the middle of a jungle. It’s a must do! 

There’s nothing I would change about this property (except maybe Netflix streaming on the tv since i normally fall asleep to old favorite shows). Truly a spectacular once in a lifetime experience to feel so welcomed by this team - THANK YOU everyone who made us feel like family.
title: Spectacular In Every Way

text:

very nice pool, rooms - very practical and with all amenities

placeInfo/address: Palatupana, Yala National Park 95000 Sri Lanka
text:
Sri Lanka has some beautiful properties, but, in our experience trained staff and service mindset is often missing. Not so at Hilton Yala. You find caring and thoughtful staff in every aspect of your experience from Vino (all requests were met with kindness and promptness), who is the front desk manager to Hashini in dining (her smile never fades) to Pasindu who is the ranger (his enthusiasm never wanes) and the overall service experience feels very different than other resorts we have experienced in Sri Lanka. 

The rangers are a true highlight. We are frequent travelers to South Africa and it is hard to beat a safari in Kruger, but thanks to the rangers (with Sajith leading) here who are trained in South Africa, you walk away with a better sense and appreciation of the flora and fauna of Sri Lanka. The safari experience here is different in that it is a lot denser in terms of traffic etc., but the landscape is stunning and unique and worth doing for sure. 

If you have a chance, stay at the premium villa with pool. It is indeed a beautiful villa for a safari experience. 

Overall really enjoyed our experience here, special thanks to the staff who made it all a reality!
title: Great safari property with wonderful staff!

text: Our family of 4 (2 young kids) loved our stay at the gorgeous new Hilton Yala. Welcome drinks and towels upon arrival, beautiful architecture, and one of the most impressive hotel pools I’ve ever seen (not to mention private pools at most rooms). The rooms are technologically advanced (motorized shades, auto toilet seat covers/bidet, a lot of outlets, great mood lighting, etc). We booked a morning safari through hotel and it was fun. Sunset on the beach at hotel was beautiful. Spent a full day lounging around our private pool (we had a premium pool villa) and the main hotel pool (perfect water temperature) and the service was great. There is a small heated children’s pool as well. Very good security, including mirror checks under vehicles upon arrival and multiple 24-hour guards in towers near the beach to watch for intruders (animals and people). Can’t imagine a more perfect place to stay in Yala. Highly recommend.
title: Best Pool in Sri Lanka

text:
From the second we arrived at the Hilton we were warmly welcomed and actually a bit stunned by how beautiful the hotel was. 

After a safety briefing by the rangers monkeys came swinging along the trees really making it feel like a safari adventure. 

The rooms were perfect, I’m not embarrassed to say that the smart toilet with the heated seat was a winner! I highly advise getting the gel pillow off the menu for the best nights sleep. 

We did two safaris with our lovely ranger Sam. He was very knowledgable but didn’t overwhelm the tour of Block 1 with non stop chatting. We did both a morning and afternoon excursion - I would personally recommend the afternoon as we saw a lot more wildlife. 

The quality of food during our stay was second to none, the head chef was diligent and personalised every meal to your taste. You must ask for his green beans tossed in garlic butter. For breakfast you can have eggs literally anyway you can think of - ‘Eggs on the Beach’ were really quite special. I loved how Sri Lanka was at the heart of the menu and we were able to try so many traditional dishes that were all spectacular. It probably helps that our waiter Dilanka served everything with a smile and was very charming! 

To finish off the perfect stay a trip to the spa is a must. The treatment rooms feel like they’re in the middle of the wild. We had the contour facial that was 90 minutes of bliss. 

We just wanted to say a massive thank you to Vino and his team for such a marvellous stay 🤍
title: A glimpse of paradise!

ownerResponse/text:
Dear Adventure12441488637,

Thank you for taking the time to share your experience, and we are thrilled to hear that you chose to celebrate your son’s birthday with us! We’re delighted that you enjoyed the unique setting and especially the dining experience—it means a lot to us that it stood out as one of the best you’ve had.

Regarding the need for buggies after 6 PM, this policy is in place to ensure the safety of our guests as the resort is located within Yala National Park, where wildlife is abundant. We truly appreciate your understanding of this measure, which helps us offer a secure and seamless experience while maintaining harmony with the natural environment.

We hope to welcome you and your family back for another memorable stay in the future!

Warm regards,

It’s wonderful to hear that you enjoyed the pre-arrival arrangements and felt warmly welcomed upon arrival. Our team takes great pride in ensuring a seamless experience, and knowing that you felt at home makes our efforts all the more worthwhile.

We’re thrilled that the villa upgrades and thoughtful touches like your Nespresso machine and the spotlessly maintained pool added to your comfort and enjoyment. And what an incredible memory to have – a monitor lizard sunbathing on your terrace! Experiences like this truly highlight the unique connection our resort offers with nature.

Your kind words about our culinary offerings and the team’s personalized approach to dining are deeply appreciated. Chef and the dining team will be overjoyed to know that their dedication to showcasing local flavors made such a lasting impression. The birthday celebration you mentioned was an absolute joy for our team to arrange, and we’re so glad it made your day special.

Thank you also for highlighting our sustainability efforts. It is a cause very close to our hearts, and your recognition of these initiatives is immensely encouraging.

Your feedback about our hospitality, especially the warmth and attentiveness of the team, is what means the most to us. Creating memorable experiences and making our guests feel like part of our family is what we strive for every day.

On behalf of the entire Hilton Yala team, thank you once again for choosing to stay with us and for sharing such a detailed and glowing review. We look forward to welcoming you back for another extraordinary stay in the jungle – your Hilton Yala family is always here to make your next visit just as special.

placeInfo/address: Palatupana, Yala National Park 95000 Sri Lanka
text:
As a Hilton Diamond Member for over 10 years, I have stayed at countless Hilton properties around the globe, but Hilton Yala stands out as one of the very best. From start to finish, my experience was nothing short of extraordinary.

Pre-Arrival and Welcome
Shortly after booking, I received an email from my personal assistant at the front desk, who provided all the relevant details for my stay. Their attentiveness ensured a seamless transfer to the property, leaving me stress-free and ready to relax. Upon arrival, the front desk team greeted me warmly, making me feel instantly at home.

Located in the heart of the Yala Jungle, and just a 15-minute drive from the renowned Yala National Park, the hotel offers an ideal base for those seeking adventure and wildlife exploration. The check-in process includes a security briefing by a knowledgeable ranger, which is both informative and reassuring, given the presence of wildlife such as elephants and a crocodile near the bio pond. The hotel’s private beach is equally adventurous and requires accompaniment by a ranger due to the possibility of encountering wild animals.

The Villas: A Luxurious Oasis in the Jungle
Transfers to the villas are done via buggy, adding to the exclusive feel of the experience. The villas themselves are a masterpiece of luxury – beautifully designed, private, and equipped with everything you could need, including a private pool and sun deck. As a Diamond Member, I was twice upgraded to one of the finest villas, a gesture that truly elevated my stay.

Inside the villa, I found thoughtful amenities like a Nespresso machine, tea pods, a minibar, a safe, and even guest flip-flops. Housekeeping did a phenomenal job keeping the space spotless and ensuring that no jungle creatures ventured indoors. My villa was in pristine condition, and everything worked flawlessly, as if brand new.

One morning, I even had a visit from a monitor lizard sunbathing on my terrace – a unique reminder of the hotel’s extraordinary location.

Dining: A Culinary Adventure
The dining experience at Hilton Yala was nothing short of exceptional. Every evening, the chef personally greeted guests, offering personalized recommendations based on the freshest local ingredients. The service staff were equally impressive – knowledgeable about the menu and always eager to ensure a memorable dining experience.

The menu is thoughtfully curated, emphasizing local flavors rather than imported options, which I deeply appreciated. For example, fresh local shrimp takes center stage instead of frozen salmon flown in from abroad. The presentation and taste of every dish were impeccable, and the wine menu catered to a wide range of preferences.

A standout touch was the homemade ice cream and sorbets, which were simply divine.

On my birthday, the staff went above and beyond, singing Happy Birthday, serving a delicious cake, and offering a glass of champagne. The front desk manager also presented me with a handwritten birthday card, making me feel truly special – like part of a family.

Facilities and Activities
The main infinity pool is a highlight of the property, impeccably maintained and offering stunning views. The pool team cleans it daily and also attends to the private pools.

The spa is another must-visit, offering a variety of treatments in a serene and clean environment. The massage I received was incredibly relaxing, and the staff’s friendliness added to the experience.

Hospitality at its Finest
What truly sets Hilton Yala apart is its unparalleled hospitality. Every team member, from the front desk to the housekeeping staff, goes above and beyond to make you feel valued and cared for. The warmth, attentiveness, and genuine desire to fulfill every guest's wish is hospitality on a grand scale – a level rarely experienced, even at luxury properties.

Commitment to Sustainability
One of the most impressive aspects of Hilton Yala is its commitment to sustainability. The resort actively minimizes its environmental impact by using locally sourced ingredients in its cuisine, reducing waste, and promoting eco-friendly practices throughout the property. From the use of renewable resources to supporting the local community, every detail reflects a dedication to preserving the pristine environment of the Yala Jungle.

Overall Experience
Hilton Yala is not just a hotel; it’s an unforgettable experience. The combination of unparalleled luxury, exceptional hospitality, and the thrill of being surrounded by nature makes it one of the top Hilton properties I have ever visited.

Whether you’re looking for a luxurious base for your safari or a peaceful retreat with a touch of adventure, Hilton Yala delivers on every front. The entire team’s dedication to creating a perfect stay ensures that you’ll leave with memories to last a lifetime.

I cannot recommend this property highly enough – it’s truly at an LXR Luxury level and worth every moment. Knowing that your stay supports sustainable tourism and experiencing hospitality on such a grand level makes it all the more rewarding.
title: Hilton Yala Hotel: A Hidden Gem in the Jungle with Unmatched Luxury, Hospitality, and Sustainability

Chef Ubyofa hat uns persönlich chauffiert und u  na d die Sehenswürdigkeiten gezeigt und alles in sehr gutem Englisch erklärt.

Nach fast 4 Wochen zurück in der Heimat, denke ich jeden Tag an die wundervollen 2 Wochen zurück. 
Meine erste Erfahrung mit einer Ayurveda Kur war einfach unglaublich! 
Gemeinsam mit meiner besten Freundin verbrachte ich diese Zeit in einem kleinen, 
charmanten Hotel mit nur 10 Zimmern. Die familiäre Atmosphäre schuf eine herzliche Umgebung, die unseren Aufenthalt zu etwas ganz Besonderem machte. 
Die Behandlungen waren äußerst professionell und einzigartig. Die Zimmer wurden 
täglich gereinigt und liebevoll mit Blumen geschmückt, der Garten wurde sorgfältig 
gepflegt. Das ayurvedische Essen war köstlich, abwechslungsreich und eine neue Erfahrung. Ein gemeinsamer Kochabend war nicht nur lehrreich, sondern auch 
inspirierend. Das Ärzteteam kümmerte sich täglich fürsorglich um uns. 
Die morgendlichen Yoga- oder Qi GongStunden sowie der Blick auf das Meer 
waren eine wahre Wohltat für Körper und Geist. 
Jan, die Seele dieses Hotels, spricht perfekt Deutsch und teilte gerne sein Wissen 
über Ayurveda. Er half uns bei der Organisation von Ausflügen und stand uns als 
Übersetzer zur Seite. Ich kann diesen Ort nur wärmstens empfehlen.
Wir werden definitiv wiederkommen. 
Ein herzliches Dankeschön an alle, die unseren Aufenthalt so besonders gemacht 
haben.
title: Eine wundervolle Zeit!

placeInfo/address: Thalgahapitiya Road, Kosgoda 80570 Sri Lanka
text: Ich habe gerade zwei wunderbare Wochen im Garden Beach Ayurveda Resort verbracht. Es ging los mit einem herzlicher Empfang durch Jan, den sehr gut deutsch sprechenden Gästebetreuer, der sich viel Zeit nahm, alles Wichtige zu erklären. Dann war Mittagessen-Zeit und an einem langen Tisch hatte ich Gelegenheit, die anderen Gäste kennen zu lernen. Die Atmosphäre ist sehr familiär und man fühlt sich von Anfang an richtig wohl.  Mein Zimmer mit Balkon war im 3. Stock mit herrlichem Blick in den gepflegten Garten und auf das Meer. Das Rauschen der Wellen ist ein ständiger Begleiter und lässt einen Nachts sehr gut schlafen. Nach der Erstkonsultation mit der Ayourveda-Ärztin (auf Wunsch dolmetscht Jan) wird eine individuelle Medikation und ein Essensplan festgelegt. Generell ist anzumerken, dass man auch ohne oder wenig Englischkenntnissen wunderbar zurecht kommt. Alle Gäste kamen aus Deutschland und bei Bedarf ist Jan zur Stelle. Jeden Tag gab es vier Anwendungen. Die Masseur*innen sind sehr freundlich und verstehen ihr Handwerk. Stirnguss, Peeling, Schwitzkasten, Kräuterbad sind weitere Highlights, ebenso Yoga und Qigong in der Früh bei Sonnenaufgang auf einer überdachten Terrasse mit Blick auf das Meer. Ein frühmorgendlicher Ausflug mit dem Boot noch vor Sonnenaufgang in die Lagunen des Madu-River ist weiterhin sehr empfehlenswert. Danke auch an Nalin, der mit dem TukTuk Gäste auf Wunsch zum Wochenmarkt oder zum Shoppen in einen Teeladen/Gewürzladen fährt. Fazit: Nach zwei Wochen fühlt man sich runderneuert  und mindestens zehn Jahre jünger. Ich komme bestimmt wieder. Uwe F.
title: Traumhafte 14-tägige Ayourveda Kur im Garden Beach Resort

placeInfo/address: Thalgahapitiya Road, Kosgoda 80570 Sri Lanka
text:
Das Garden Beach Ayurveda Resort ist in jeder Hinsicht eine kleine Perle. 

Die Lage direkt am Strand und der liebevoll gepflegte Garten verleihen äußerlich dem Hotel ein tolles Ambiente.
Ganz herausragend wurde unser Aufenthalt dort wegen der besonderen Freundlichkeit und Zugewandheit der Hotel-Mitarbeiter. Es ist nicht aufgesetzt, sondern kommt von Herzen. Egal, ob es das Eingehen auf die nicht-ayurvedischen Essenswünsche unserer Kinder war oder die Beantwortung vieler Fragen, das Schmücken des Essenstisches....
Auch die Masseurinnen und Masseure geben alles, um mit ihren wundervollen Behandlungen Verspannungen zu lösen.
Zum Konzept gehört, dass die Gäste gemeinsam an einem Tisch essen, um miteinander ins Gespräch zu kommen. Manchmal wird auch draußen mit Meerblick aufgetischt.
Abgerundet wird alles mit dem morgendlichen Yoga mit Meerblick.

Der Leiter des Hotel, Janaka, hat hier mit viel Fingerspitzengefühl etwas geschaffen, was man durchaus als Perle bezeichnen kann. Wir sind als Gäste gekommen und als Freunde gegangen!
title: Das Garden Beach Ayurveda Hotel - eine Perle mit viel menschlicher Zugewandheit

placeInfo/address: Thalgahapitiya Road, Kosgoda 80570 Sri Lanka
text:
Ein sehr schöner Ort, hier stimmt einfach alles. Ein familiär geführtes Haus, man kommt als Gast und geht als Freund, tatsächlich.
Die Mitarbeiter sind absolut liebenswürdig und schaffen eine durchweg äusserst positive Atmospähre und kein Wunsch bleibt unerfüllt.
Ausflüge jeglicher Art können geplant werden, der Anwendungsplan wird von den Ärzten drumherum gestaltet, sodaß keine der Anwendungen verloren geht. Es gab zur Unterhaltung abendliche Besuche von Sitar-Spielern, Mönchen, das morgendliche Yoga war sehr gut.
Es gab gleich 2 Ärzte, die sich liebevoll um uns kümmerten, auf unsere Doshas abgestimmtes, sehr leckeres und phantasievoll dekoriertes Essen.
Gleich 4 Anwendungen pro Tag, wir haben bereits einige Aryuveda-Kuren hinter uns, so eine intensive bisher jedoch noch nicht.
Die Krönung des Ganzen ist Janaka, für uns "Doctor Aryuveda", ein deutschsprechender Kur-Manager, der uns unerschöpflich alles, was wir über Aryuveda wissen wollten, erklären konnte. Bei fast jeder Mahlzeit wurden die einzelnen Gemüse etc. von ihm erläutert und häufig auch in ihrem "Rohzustand" gezeigt. Durch seine Deutschkenntnisse waren auch Mißverständnisse bei den ärztlichen Konsultationen ausgeschlossen, das war äusserst hilfreich für uns und auch das für eine Kur einzigartig.
Das Haus liegt unmittelbar am Meer, hat einen kleinen, aber gepflegten Garten und einen spektaktulären Blick auf den indischen Ozean.
Links und rechts ist es "ruhig", einsame Strandspaziergänge sind möglich. Schwimmen ist aufgrund der sehr starken Strömung nicht wirklich möglich, aber mit den Wellen toben reicht ja auch. Im Garten gibt es sonst einen kleinen Pool, der für einige Schwimmzüge ausreicht.
Das Haus ist mit sehr vielen liebevollen Details eingerichtet, unser Zimmer hat uns gut gefallen, wurde täglich mit Blumen geschmückt und das Moskitonetz jeden Tag ausgebreitet.  Es gibt insgesamt nur 10 Zimmer.
Wer jedoch Wert auf perfekt lackierte Fußleisten und millimetergenau schließende Fenster etc. legt, ist hier nicht wirklich gut aufgehoben. Das Haus ist ein wenig in die Jahre gekommen und auch die Lage direkt am Meer und der halbjährliche heftige Monsun machen den Erhalt von Gebäuden nicht einfach. Gerne kommen wir wieder an diesen besonderen Ort.
title: Ein besonders schöner Aryuveda-Urlaub

ownerResponse/text:
Chères Isabelle et Nadia,
Merci beaucoup pour votre merveilleux commentaire ! Nous sommes ravis d'apprendre que vous avez vécu un séjour aussi positif et transformateur au Garden Beach Ayurveda Resort.
Il est merveilleux de savoir que vous avez trouvé que chaque aspect de votre visite - de la chambre spacieuse avec vue sur l'océan aux repas adaptés à votre dosha - correspondait exactement à ce que vous espériez. Nos médecins, thérapeutes et toute l'équipe s'efforcent de fournir les soins et l'attention que chaque client mérite, et il est gratifiant de voir que telle a été votre expérience.
Je transmettrai vos aimables paroles à Jan ; il possède une mine de connaissances et aime toujours les partager avec nos clients. Nous sommes ravis que les massages et les traitements ayurvédiques vous aient procuré tant de joie et de détente pendant votre séjour.
Merci encore de nous avoir choisis pour votre voyage ayurvédique. Nous sommes impatients de vous accueillir à nouveau dans notre paradis pour d'autres moments de paix, de guérison et de joie.
Avec nos chaleureuses salutations,
Garden Beach Team - Udyoga

roomTip: Ne vous surchargez pas en vêtements , on vous fourni des paréos tous les jours !!
text: Si vous cherchez La Cure ayurvédique Ideale, dans l'endroit idéal avec les personnes idéales qui sauront prendre soin de vous à la perfection, vous l'avez trouvé !! C'est ici que vous devez venir, et c'est ici que nous reviendrons très vite !! Tout a été parfait, la grande chambre très propre avec vue idyllique sur l'ocean, les repas excellents très diversifiés et en accord avec notre dosha, les deux doctoresse adorables et très professionnelles, tout le personnel, les masseurs, serveurs, cuisiniers, absolument tous ont été adorables, et Jan le manager, très érudit et dans le partage de ses connaissances, et très disponible pour nous ! Les massages ont été divins, incroyables ! Nous avons eu beaucoup de gratitude pour tout ce que nous avons reçu pendant notre séjour de 10 jours, une parenthèse enchantée, vous ne reviendrez plus tout à fait les mêmes, allégé, libéré, et surtout rempli de joie !! Et une fois qu'on y a goûté, on veut revenir très vite au garden beach ayurveda resort !! À très bientôt !! Isabelle et Nadia de Moselle, France
title: Le paradis sur terre !!

placeInfo/address: Thalgahapitiya Road, Kosgoda 80570 Sri Lanka
text:
Hello Everyone,
I would like to express my deepest gratitude to Garden beach Ayurveda resort Team!
In February 2023 I had an unbelievable time there, everything was above expectations. I was so welcomed even before my trip by a management of the resort, who provided the best quality and with highest respect a service in booking, explanations of details of my stay and preparation activities before my  arrival.
My trip from an airport to the Resort was well organized, very comfortable and pleasant.
Despite of my early morning arrival to the resort I was so warmly welcomed by employees, who presented me a wonderful necklace made of flowers. My luggage was immediately brought to my lovely room, housekeeping employer represented me a room and explained about everything. His smile and positive attitude made me feel as at home immediately. My room was always super clean and beautifully decorated by flowers and funny figures made from towels 😊
A few hours later I was welcomed by office manager who has extraordinary knowledge about Ayurveda life style and Sri-Lanka. His high respectful way of working and easy personal talks made me feel like I am a special guest. Based on my wishes special unique tours to Sri-Lanka famous pales were organized for me, without interruption of my treatment plan. Office manager also  during all days provided great presentations / explanations of Ayurveda cuisine, providing a lot of information about  usefulness of each single food item.
Doctors of the resort are highly professional, they create miracles not only in improving of body health conditions but also in improving of mental wellbeing. After a few days of treatment with a lot of massages and relaxation I felt myself as newly born and absolutely happy person, my health issues slowly disappeared and even after weeks of my vacation I feel good and highly motivated to keep a happy and healthy life style.
Ayurveda treatment team all together and each separately creates miracles while doing different kinds of massage treatment. Again I could feel a lot of respect towards me, a lot of attention to personal needs and requests during massage, as of course welcoming and smiling attitude created unbelievable results out of treatments.
One more important part of Ayurveda treatment is high quality special healthy food, which was done on fantastic level with personal approach to individual health conditions and special wishes. A service during the meals was fantastic! Some breakfast, lunches, dinners were organized outside in the ocean coast or in the garden, tables were beautifully decorated. Every day 3 times per day I personally could feel a care and attention of restaurant service guys.
The resort is located directly on ocean coast and surrounded by a very nice garden, which is under care of a gardener, who brings wonderful flowers to the guests and knows a lot about ocean and turtles.
In general, Garden beach Ayurveda resort is an cozy place with perfect management, high professional doctors and treatment team, very caring kitchen and restaurant as well as housekeeping employees and of course wonderful people-guests!
I definitely would like to come back and wish everyone to have the same experience as I had.
Be healthy and happy!
Best regards,
Svetlana
title: Colorful calm paradise! ☀️🌴

Das Personal war immer freundlich, das Essen war abwechslungsreich und lecker, und wenn es mal keinen Wind zum surfen gab, wurden verschiedene Aktivitäten angeboten. Zum Beispiel Lagerfeuer, Yoga, zum Nationalpark und so weiter. 

Als einzigen negativen Punkt gebe ich das alte Equipment an, das hier zum Schulen verwendet wird. Mein Lehrer war durchaus kompetent und ich habe viel gelernt.

Immer wieder gerne

text:
Были в декабре 2024, все понравилось, вид из номера на 2 этаже прямо по центру на океан, каждый день прекрасно просыпаться с таким видом. Это два отеля объединенных одним названием, ресторан был в waves, все жильцы могли пользоваться обеими территориями.
Кормили вкусно, брали только завтраки, еда немного специфична, не Турция, но нам было хорошо. Отель не самый близкий ко всем локациям но и не далеко, везде реально дойти пешком, изучили весь район от и до, много пользовались местными автобусами, вообще топ) нас там за местных считали уже) 
В номере просторно, все предоставляли когда в этом была необходимость, персонал душки, все приятные, постоянно улыбаются и здороваются. В отеле раз в неделю проходили представления, фаер шоу 
Тихо спокойно, с заднего двора всегда смотрели на павлинов по утрам))
Главный менеджер (лысый парень:) очень приятный, с ним было легко поддерживать общение, все мальчики ребята, девочки на ресепшене приветливые и дружелюбные.
Много интернациональных туристов ну и россиян)
Проблем никаких не было, все было хорошо, отдых удался!
Спасибо за отдых, нам очень понравилось, сейчас вспоминаю и хочется вернуться обратно 🥹😍🥰

ПС многие говорят про воровство на Шри, но в данном отеле мы об этом не слышали, все тихо спокойно, но свои хитрости на всякий случай мы тоже использовали
title: Шри ланка Thaproban pavilion waves

text: La verdad es que justo cuando llegamos cansados y con mucho calor, el personal del hotel nos dio una bienvenida con una bebida fresca que supo a gloria mientras realizábamos el check-in. Las dos piscinas que tienen son espectaculares, con una vista al mar pero sin acceso a la playa. Disponen de servicio de traslado a la playa, que está a 5 minutos del hotel. El personal del restaurante es muy atento y simpático, y la habitación que tuvimos tenía unas vistas impresionantes del mar al encontrarse en el tercer piso. Se podían ver espectaculares puestas de sol. La habitación fue muy espaciosa; el baño era decente, no lo mejor del hotel, pero muy limpio. La verdad es que toda la habitación estaba muy limpia. En definitiva, es bastante recomendable si buscas una zona de tranquilidad y disfrutar de unos días.
title: Tranquilidad y buena elección.

В следующий раз обязательно вернёмся в этот отель.

text:
Stayed here for three nights during our Sri Lanka trip. The hotel is actually two hotels; Thaprobam Pavilion and Thaprobam Waves. They are connected together with one reception area and the pools and bar can be used by both sets of guests.

We stayed one night in the Pavilion and two nights at Waves. The rooms at Waves are more modern and the mattress was much more firm so I would recommend booking a room here. That said all the staff were amazing and did everything they could to accommodate our requests and look after us.

The two pools were good and we never struggled to find sun loungers.

The hotel is located a seven minute walk from the main bars and restaurants of the resort and the beach too.
title: Great location in Unawatuna

text:
We had the most incredible stay at this hotel. From the moment we arrived, we were greeted by warm, smiling faces at reception. A special mention to Sohani and Sandanu for their wonderful welcome – they truly set the tone for our whole stay.

The staff went above and beyond to make us feel at home. We stayed in the two-bedroom suite, which was perfect for our family of four. The split-level design made it feel especially spacious and luxurious.

The hotel has been tastefully designed with a serene beach vibe throughout. The main pool is absolutely stunning, offering views out to sea, and the smaller pool provided a peaceful alternative – also with beautiful views.

The location of the hotel was excellent. Just a 10–15 minute walk into town – or a quick tuk-tuk ride if you prefer – it was close enough to be convenient but far enough away to remain peaceful and relaxing.

Breakfast was generous and catered to all tastes, with both Western and Sri Lankan options. We also enjoyed lunch and dinner at the hotel – every meal was delicious and pleased both adults and kids alike.

During our stay, we went on several trips, and we’re especially grateful to Gihan for his fantastic advice on the best places to visit.

We were genuinely sad to leave the Thaproban and are already thinking about when we can return! The hotel itself is stunning but it is the staff that make it. We highly recommend staying.
title: A Truly Memorable Stay – We Can’t Wait to Return!

text: Amazing Sri Lankan hotel. Everything about it was amazing. The food and service at the buffet and Italian restaurant was fantastic. They looked after us an incredible amount. We took our 4 year old to kids club and their activities were superb where my son had great time and kept saying ‘I want to go back to kids club’ after we left. placeInfo/address: St. Sebastian's Road, Kalutara 12000 Sri Lanka
roomTip: Don't pay to upgrade to Deluxe Ocean View Room
text:
The word "presumptious" describes this hotel well.
It's in beautiful surroundings right by a nice beach,but it's so overpriced for what it offers. It's relying upon it's location.
The evening buffet is so overpriced, and the service is not great. 
No atmosphere or Sri Lankan experience feeling at all. For a genuine experience walk up the road to the Red Lobster run by a family and so authentic and reasonably priced. 
We paid quite a premium for a Deluxe Ocean View and had no sea view apart from a little bit over tall palm trees. Please don't waste your money.
When we went to settle the bill at reception it took forever. Definitely not 5* service. They definitely need to up their game. Having stayed in various hotels in Southern India which excelled,  this hotel does not live up to it's expectations.
title: Presumptuous hotel in lovely surroundings.

text:
We came here to relax after a 2 week tour of Sri Lanka, and what a place to come!

It was really peaceful with fantastic amenities  great restaurants and beautiful rooms. 

What made this place truly wonderful was the amazing staff. From the moment we were welcomed into the hotel to the time we left for home, the staff went out of their way to smile, say hello, and generally make sure we were looked after.

A special shout out to the staff in the Olu restaurant. The food was so varied and incredibly delicious. The chefs are so passionate about the food being provided and it was great to learn more about the food from them. Service here was fantastic. What a great team!

We got to know some really great people at the Olu Bar. Suranda, Nipun, Kavithra and Thilina  were fantastic. It was a pleasure chatting with this team. We were really sad to say goodbye, but want to thank them for making our stay so memorable! 

We’d love to come back someday, but we will always recommend this to anyone wanting to visit this magical island. 

Thank you!! 😊😊
title: A wonderful place to relax after a 2 week tour

placeInfo/addressObj/street1: 01, Radella, Avissawella - Hatton - Nuwara Eliya Hwy,
text:
This is a lovely hotel in a beautiful setting overlooking the tea plantation. It is a former tea plantation building and is a fine example of the colonial past. 
The staff are very welcoming and nothing was too much trouble for them. We had a beautiful room with a balcony overlooking the garden and the valley.
The food was delicious and there was plenty of it. Our booking included breakfast and dinner. 
There is a heated pool although we did not try it. We did however have a round of putting on the putting green. There is also a grass tennis court.
We did a short walk from the hotel up to the sunrise and sunset view points which was easy to follow. 
Whilst there we visited Pedro Plantation to meet a retired tea planter to learn all about the tea growing industry.
It is a short car journey to Nanu Oya where you can catch the famous train through the hills and plantations to Ella.
title: A taste of colonial times

We had a lovely stay for 2 nights here and want to return in future too. It is a 130 year old (renovated) property that is so well maintained, with lawn gardens, a pool, bench to sit looking at the tea gardens with a book and even a piano in the bar area.
The ever attentive and efficient Amaldi at reception snd every single staff member made our stay special. The food was also tasty- we tried the traditional Srilankan food and they even gave us idli (as we are vegetarians) off the menu for breakfast.
Last evening we also met Mr. Fauzi ( General Manager) -a real gentleman who treats all guests so well and observed how true hospitality flows from the top.
title: Superb property, location and service

roomTip: take a walk amongst the Tea fields behind the hotel
text:
A really stunning setting for a hotel, nestled amongst the Tea fields. This is really a beautiful hotel with lovely quaint rooms. The food was exceptional and staff were very friendly and helpful.
Outside the hotel there's a walk you can do which takes you amongst the Tea fields.
There is a pool area with sunbeds , but my one comment would be that a few more umbrellas would be useful .  we wanted to sit by the pool but unfortunately there was no room and the sunbeds on the lawn had no shade either.
The other area up on the lawn outside the restaurant has one table with four chairs and that was also occupied . I think this particular day all the guests stayed in the hotel ! So my one suggestion to the management would be to perhaps put a couple more seating areas around with tables for guests to sit in.

Apart from this it was a wonderful stay in a lovely setting.
title: Stunning views from Hotel

text:
Set on the side of a hill, this is a really inviting hotel.  Its facilities are plentiful with activities for all active people.
Staff immediately are on hand to help and offer advice to travellers; and done with a smile.  The rooms are very well proportioned and bedrooms are modern with old colonial charm.
The food was delicious and served on time.  The menu changed so was not repetitive.  It was well presented and plentiful.  
The views are incredible, taking in sweeping vistas of the surrounding hills with tea plantations all around.
Quiet and restful.  Would thoroughly recommend this hotel.
title: A delight in the hills

placeInfo/address: Kotikambokka 91200 Sri Lanka
text:
We had the best time at Kaduruketha. From the moment we there till we left, the staff made us feel like we were visiting long lost family. It was pure Sri Lankan hospitality.  Have to specially mention Lishali, Faizal, Sanduni and chef Subath. The folks went above and beyond to make us feel at home.

The food was phenomenal. You know how good the food is when the your clothes gets tighter. That’s exactly what happened to us😁 On our first night we told that there is nothing they can’t get us food wise, since we were group of 11 with picky eaters and different food preferences. Boy oh boy did they true to this or what😊

Lastly this gem is situated in a 60 ache lot. Most of it paddy fields. From the moment you open the room door, you have beautiful views of the paddy fields. Plenty of walking paths to get lost in its beauty. 

They even have a great wake-up call service — a friendly peacock strolling by to greet you, like a feathered neighbor wishing you a good morning.
title: One for the books❤️

placeInfo/address: Kotikambokka 91200 Sri Lanka
text:
We had another wonderful experience at Jetwing Kaduruketha during our stay from 26th to 27th April.
This was our second visit, and once again, the hospitality and warmth made it truly special.

Our family — Me, my wife, our 10-year-old son, 5-year-old daughter, and my wife’s parents — stayed for one night and enjoyed every moment. From the moment we arrived, we felt at home thanks to the exceptional service of our butler, Lishali, and her amazing team.

Our daughter immediately connected with the kind-hearted staff and was loved by all. The hotel team even gifted soft toys to our kids and took them on a lovely farm visit to collect fresh chicken eggs — a truly memorable experience for them.

We thoroughly enjoyed all three meals during our stay — every dish was beautifully prepared and tasted exceptional.

Jetwing Kaduruketha once again gave us not just a stay, but beautiful, lasting memories as a family. We are already looking forward to our next visit!
title: Family Love and Unforgettable Moments – Thank You, Jetwing Kaduruketha!

placeInfo/address: Kotikambokka 91200 Sri Lanka
text:
Jetwing Kaduruketha made our family trip a unique and unforgettable experience. The staff were really hospitable and attentive. The food was amazing, offering a mix of local and international dishes.
Specially Mr. Faizal and our personal butler Ms Lushani together with rest of the crew made our stay perfect. They helped us to prepare food for our baby and even took care of her during our meals. 
The surrounding is so beautiful with Mountain views over the paddy fields. Rooms do not have AC or a TV, but we did not feel the need. We had a quality family time here. Can recommend without any hesitation.

placeInfo/address: Kotikambokka 91200 Sri Lanka
text:
We stayed at this amazing hotel during an extended tour of Sri Lanka. There were 10 of us visiting from the US  and the hotel and its staff went out of their way to make it a one-of-a-kind experience. The views and the accommodations speak for themselves but it's really the touches of Sri Lankan hospitality from our hosts that made this stay unforgettable. So great in fact that we actually cancelled our early checkout plans so we could spend a little extra time here. 

Mr. Faizal in particular was instrumental in giving us a bespoke experience of the highest caliber and we can't thank the staff enough for taking care of us so well during our stay. I give Jetwing Kaduruketha the highest of recommendations!
title: Unforgettable views and hospitality

placeInfo/address: Kotikambokka 91200 Sri Lanka
text: Our stay last week at Jetwing Kaduruketha was simply awesome. The cool and calm green environment created a peaceful escape from everyday life. The pleasant and friendly staff made us feel completely at ease, adding to the relaxed and welcoming atmosphere of the premises. The food was fabulous, and the rooms were clean and cozy — giving us a real homey feeling. Highly recommended for anyone looking to unwind in nature's embrace!
title: A Truly Relaxing Getaway!

placeInfo/address: Kotikambokka 91200 Sri Lanka
text:
My wife, our 5-year-old daughter, and I are frequent travellers who usually opt for large hotels offering pools and big buffets. This time, however, we were in the mood for something a little more adventurous. Drawn by the great reviews and excellent pricing, we chose to spend three days at Jetwing Kaduruketha, and it turned out to be an unforgettable experience.

Words fall short in capturing the natural beauty of this place. Surrounded by lush greenery and wildlife, the setting felt almost magical. One highlight was watching the sunset in the rain from our cozy Arachchi Villa. We also took a short trip to Ella Wala Waterfall, just 15 minutes away by car, and were blown away by the scenery.

The service was exceptional. Our young personal butler, Kavindu, was incredibly attentive and kind, making our stay comfortable. A special thanks also to Mr. Faizal, whose experience and warmth were evident in every interaction we had at the restaurant.

The food was delicious, and overall, our stay was absolutely magnificent. If I could suggest a couple of small improvements, I’d recommend providing smaller pillows and refreshing the restaurant décor for a more refined ambiance.

Highly recommended for anyone seeking a peaceful and nature-rich escape.
title: A Wonderful Stay at Jetwing Kaduruketha

placeInfo/address: Kotikambokka 91200 Sri Lanka
text:
From the moment we arrived at the hotel to the time we left, it was truly one of the best experiences we've had. We enjoyed every bit of our stay, the delicious food, breathtaking scenic views, and the warm hospitality made it unforgettable.

A special thanks to Lishali, who assisted us throughout our stay. Her pleasant smile and genuine efforts to ensure our comfort truly stood out. The restaurant staff were also incredibly friendly and welcoming.

We only wish we had booked two nights instead of one! If you're someone seeking modern luxuries, you might find this place a bit different, it offers a charming and authentic village experience rather than a typical luxury resort feel. But for us, that was part of its unique charm.
title: Exceptional Stay!

placeInfo/address: Kotikambokka 91200 Sri Lanka
roomTip: Plan to stay here as long as you can!!
text: I’ve been a lot of places and stayed in a lot of hotels. This is by far my favorite. It’s so tranquil and the staff so attentive. I wish I could stay forever!  They accommodate every request. The food is delicious. I recommend having your breakfast brought down to the pool.
title: Never want to leave!

text: The most scenic place i have ever stayed at this hotel provided us with a personalised service. Faizal at the restaurant is a true asset to the hotel. The kids loved the pool, a true touch with nature and its surroundings. Naturally more bugs, mosquitos and animals in the hotel and I would recommend the mosquito balm provided by the hotel. The spa was available for massages, for other facilities like yoga, pottery you need to arrange with reception in advance. Loved our time at this gem of a place, thank you

The service was excellent and rhe staff was very friendly.

placeInfo/address: Kotikambokka 91200 Sri Lanka

The food was delicious and thoughtfully prepared, and the staff were kind and attentive. A perfect mix of comfort, nature, and peace—I’m already thinking about my next visit.

placeInfo/address: Kotikambokka 91200 Sri Lanka
text: A hotel that offers something completely different. Set in the forest along side its own farmland this hotel offers peace, tranquility and nature. Rooms are purpose built chalets in the forest and offer views through woodland onto the paddy fields. The young staff are very helpful and always smiling while working under the watchful eye of Faizal, the hospitality manager. Faizal had kindly guided us through the dinner menu and suggested dishes to us which we're so glad he did as the food was divine and plenty of it. We ordered Sri Lanka curries along with a plethora of side dishes and breads. Fabulous .

ownerResponse/text:
Dear Guest, Greetings from Jetwing Kaduruketha!

Thank you so much for sharing your wonderful experience! It’s fantastic to hear that you enjoyed the environment, the activities, and the peacocks. We’re so glad you had a great time exploring the local temple, lake, and waterfall, while also finding time to meditate and have fun with Thiloka. It’s also great to know that the cookery class was such a success and that you feel confident to recreate the dishes at home. We hope you will now cook for your friend who usually always prepares meals for you back at home. If you do make any of the dishes you learnt here with us, do send some pictures as we would love to see them!

We’re especially proud of our initiative to support the local community, and we’re thrilled you had such a great time with our chef and the amazing lady from the village. We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Ayubowan! (May you live long!)

Nadhun Punchihewa 
General Manager 
Jetwing Kaduruketha
placeInfo/address: Kotikambokka 91200 Sri Lanka
text: Excellent pool for swimming laps, gorgeous design..   staff are friendly efficient and attentive. Thiloka, my personal Butler was brilliant.  .. we cycled to the local temple and Lake.  We hiked to a waterfall, meditated, paddled and laughed a lot.  The cookery class was excellent. I feel confident to repeat in my own kitchen. The chef was brilliant and the woman from the local village, employed as part of of pioneering effort to get older women into work for the first time , was a delight.
title: Great environment, people and activities plus exhibitionist  peacocks

placeInfo/address: Kotikambokka 91200 Sri Lanka
roomTip: Try the massages and the cooking class, then you eat the food and it is spectacular. Visit a nearby waterfall, try de menu restaurant.  is 🤤
text:
This place has been a great discovery on our visit to Sri Lanka, a place to remember. 

The landscape surrounded by mountains and rice fields, the sunset, the cabins, the very friendly and close staff, Nana (the restaurant manager) and the people who worked with him, the quietness and tranquility of the place.

And especially the food, my husband and I are lovers of gastronomy and in this place we have enjoyed flavors, the quality of nearby and local food and a formidable chef, thank!!  We had a massage at the Spa and it was really good.

Although this experience would not have been the same without the attention and care of Saduni, her treatment, help and attention at all times were excellent, as well as the ability to solve and manage when we needed it. She has been a great gift.

We will return.
title: A gift for the senses

placeInfo/address: Avudangawa 21120 Sri Lanka
text:
My partner and i were staying for 2 nights in the Aliya Resort & Spa. Combining top-notch service, an amazing view over sigiriya, beautiful and luxurious rooms and excellent food, this hotel is one of the finest destinations you can head to in sri lanka. 
As an animal lover, you have so much to discover in this beautiful facility. In addition to peacocks, geckos, monkeys, cows, bats, chipmunks, monitor lizards, and much more, one animal in particular managed to impress us. During a four hour night safari, we were able to spot very rare and shy loris.
Our guide Akash and his colleague made it possible for us, to see not only one, but in total 9 of these fascinating creatures. Thank you for making our stay so memorable.
title: Lori Adventure

text: I stayed at the Aliya Resort and Spa with a small group of Australian guests.  We were a group of 11.  Aliya Resort is a sprawling estate that provides all of your needs and wants without being intrusive.  The property has a large capacity, but you never feel overcrowded or neglected by staff.   The food is amazing - fresh and plenty of selection. Staff attentiveness is second to none - from housekeeping, spa, pool service, reception and of course the incredible waitstaff and bar staff.  I would love to name every single staff member but.  There are two standouts, which I know had their team members supporting them as well.  Supun, one of the head waiters was fun, friendly, professional and attentive.  His humour was well received by our group - along with his team in the bar.  Isuru was also a stand out.  His personal service to our small group at one of our dinners was exceptional.  He was polite, friendly and informative.  He also was supported by other staff, but the group loved him as well.  Thank you to all staff that looked after us.  Would return here to the resort in a flash.

text:
My second visit to Aliya Resort was truly amazing. Everything—from the staff and ambiance to the food, service, room standards, amenities, cleanliness, and facilities—was top-notch and impeccable.
Chirath and Sashi from the front office were exceptionally friendly and helpful. Chirath ensured we were well taken care of throughout our stay. It was also wonderful to see Latha and Nirosha from the kitchen downstairs, whom we met on our previous visit, recognise us and personally come to our table to say hello and check if we were happy. Their thoughtful gesture made us feel truly valued.
All the staff were very welcoming and greeted us warmly at all times. It was also impressive to see the ladies in the garden maintaining a good rapport with guests.
However, as we traveled from Australia, we were looking forward to fresh local fruit juices, especially papaya, and watermelon, at the breakfast buffet, but unfortunately, they were not on offer.

text:
A modern hotel set Into the forested area close to the sigiriya rock fortress of which there is a great view from the large light and airy reception area and adjacent bar. Included into this view is the enormous infinity pool 
The reception and service were impeccable as was the main buffet restaurant  where breakfast was also served. 
As ever, impeccable service from all the team here.

ownerResponse/text:
Dear Valued Guest,

Thank you for your wonderful review and for choosing Aliya Resort & Spa for your stay and safari experience. We are thrilled to hear that your safari was one of the highlights of your trip to Sri Lanka!

It’s fantastic to know that you enjoyed the well-organized experience, from the comfortable jeep and tasty lunch to the expertise of our senior naturalist, Mr. Akash Ukwatta. We truly appreciate your kind words about his passion and knowledge he is indeed a valued member of our team, and we will be sure to share your compliments with him.

The breathtaking landscapes and incredible wildlife encounters make Sri Lanka’s safaris truly special, and we’re delighted that you had the opportunity to experience them up close. Your wholehearted recommendation means a lot to us, and we hope to welcome you back for another adventure in the future!

Sincerely,
Chirath Chandrapala
Room Division Manager
Aliya Resort & Spa Sigiriya
placeInfo/address: Avudangawa 21120 Sri Lanka
text: During our stay at Aliya Resort & Spa Sigiriya, we went on a safari organized by this hotel. It was a great decision because the safari turned out to be one of the best trips we took in Sri Lanka. A brilliant event, organized perfectly from start to finish. A comfortable jeep, an experienced driver, a tasty lunch and, above all, a very nice guide - Mr. Akash Ukwatta (senior naturalist from the hotel), who, speaking fluent English, shared with us with passion and commitment his vast knowledge about the structure, habits and lives of the animals we encountered. His stories were great to listen to. I won't write about the wonderful landscapes and wonderful wild animals that we could observe (often from a very close distance) - you simply have to see it with your own eyes. To sum up: a great trip that I can wholeheartedly recommend to anyone going on safari in Sri Lanka. The price is affordable and the quality of services is at the highest level. Best regards to Mr. Akash and thank you very much for everything - Adrian
title: A wonderful, unforgettable safari…

ownerResponse/text: Thank you , hope to see you again soon.
placeInfo/address: Dutch Bay Road Kudawa Road, Kalpitiya 61360 Sri Lanka
text:
Ich hatte das Vergnügen, eine Woche bei Kite Surfing Lanka zu verbringen, und es war einfach fantastisch! Schon bei der Ankunft wurde ich herzlich empfangen, und das gesamte Team hat dafür gesorgt, dass ich mich sofort wohlgefühlt habe. Die Lage ist traumhaft – direkt an der wunderschönen Lagune von Kalpitiya, mit idealen Windbedingungen für Kitesurfer aller Niveaus.

Die Lehrer sind unglaublich professionell und geduldig. Sie passen die Kurse individuell an, egal ob man Anfänger ist oder schon Erfahrung hat. Die Sicherheit steht immer an erster Stelle, ohne dass der Spaß dabei zu kurz kommt. Das Equipment war hochwertig und alles war sehr gut organisiert.

Auch die Unterkünfte waren toll – gemütlich, ökologisch und mit fantastischem Blick auf die Lagune. Das Essen war ein weiteres Highlight: täglich frische und leckere Gerichte aus Sri Lanka, mit einer großen Auswahl an gesunden Optionen.

Insgesamt bietet Kite Surfing Lanka die perfekte Kombination aus Abenteuer und Entspannung in einer atemberaubenden Umgebung. Egal, ob man Kitesurfen lernen, am Strand entspannen oder die Umgebung erkunden möchte, dieser Ort hat alles zu bieten. Ich freue mich schon auf meinen nächsten Besuch!

Absolut empfehlenswert für jeden, der ein authentisches Kitesurfing-Erlebnis in Sri Lanka sucht!
title: Ein unvergessliches Erlebnis bei Kite Surfing Lanka!

placeInfo/address: Elkaduwa Road Meenawatte Estate, Kandy, Wattegama 20000 Sri Lanka
placeInfo/name: Simpson's Forest - Luxury Boutique Resort & Spa
roomTip: Pool is a great place for photos!
text:
The view is like paradise, absolutely stunning with an infinity pool overlooking the highlands of Kandy. Great gym also with a beautiful view. Lovely nature walk with a naturalist (Isuru) very easy too and saw lots of different birds, monkeys and tropical trees. Walked through beautiful tea plantations with picking workers. Ate Jack fruit, mangos , Sri Lanka olives and smelled nutmeg and cloves. We travelled as mother and daughter but also a great family hotel as well as couples. 
A little bit out of Kandy but definitely worth staying in this tranquil place of paradise. 
Yatawara (waiter) and Gunasekara (bell captain) were incredibly helpful and kind. The rest of the staff were also so obliging, kind and friendly. Staff is treated very well by the hotel owners. Lots of Instagram photo spots. Would highly recommend. 
My daughter got celiac disease and this hotel was knowledgeable and helpful.
title: View like being on top of the world. Highly recommend this beautiful hotel.
